summary: Adds a display room for your unique artifacts to the Hearthfires Cellars.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000]
[/color][/center][center][color=#1e84cc][u][b][size=5]1.5 is now out! Bug Fixes & New Room with an Exit![/size][/b][/u]
[/color][/center]


[center][size=4](I would like to thank Ld50365 for an example script) 
Check his page out here - 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6942439/?]Ld50365 Nexus Page[/url][/size][/center][size=4]
After learning some techniques I figured out how to make a room full of unique displays. So here it is... [/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6942439/?]
[/url][b][u][size=4]Description:[/size][/u][/b]
This is a mod that adds various displays for unique artifacts, items, and weapons you can find throughout the wonderful land of Skyrim and Solstheim. I always wanted more for the DLC Hearthfires, a display area for all the cool stuff find. But sadly, that wasn't the case, I had to put them in a dumb old chest. So now in every house if you go to the basement you will find a secret door that leads to a grand display room. Have fun.

[size=4][b][u]Requirements:[/u] [/b][/size]
You need the [color=#1e84cc][size=4]Dragonborn[/size][/color], [color=#1e84cc][size=4]Dawnguard[/size][/color] and [color=#1e84cc][size=4]HearthFires[/size][/color] DLC for this to work.

[u][size=4][b]Install:[/b][/size][/u]
Use your preferred mod manager to install.

[u][size=4][b]Compatibility:[/b][/size][/u]
Any mod that changes the same area where the unique display room is located will be incompatible.

[u][size=4][b]Future:[/b][/size][/u]
Fixes! Cause I know there is going to be (:

So that's it really if you have any suggestions or you want to make the mod better just hit me up via message.

[font=Arial][b][center][color=#1e84cc][size=5][u]OH, I ALMOST FORGOT...check out my other mods.[/u][/size][/color][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/20335/?]
[/url][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/20335/?][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Improved Megaton Home[/size][/color][/url][color=#1e84cc][size=4]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55951/?][color=#1e84cc]Lake House

[/color][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70318/?][color=#1e84cc]Deathbrand Remodeled[/color][/url][/size]
[/color][/center][/b][/font]

[center][size=6]Endorse if you like :)
[/size]
[img]http://i.giphy.com/XreQmk7ETCak0.gif[/img][/center]
author: Jayer117
